## Hooks.filterAsync() method

Async version of hook.filter

Signature:

```typescript
filterAsync<T extends keyof Hooks.Map & string>(id: T, value?: Hooks.Map[T] | ((param?: Hooks.Map[T]) => Promise<Hooks.Map[T]>)): Promise<Hooks.Map[T]>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                                                                                                                           | Description |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| id        | T                                                                                                                                                                              |             |
| value     | [Hooks.Map](/api/bud-framework/hooks/map)\[T\] &#124; ((param?: [Hooks/Map](//bud-framework/hooks/map)\[T\]) =&gt; Promise&lt;[Hooks/Map](//bud-framework/hooks/map)\[T\]&gt;) |             |

Returns:

Promise&lt;[Hooks.Map](/api/bud-framework/hooks/map)\[T\]&gt;

## Remarks

Hooks are processed as a waterfall.

## Example

```js
bud.hooks.filter("namespace.name.event", ["array", "of", "items"]);
```
